messages.title: A BRIGHTER FUTURE FOR OUR MENTAL HEALTH SERVICES...
messages.content: The NHS may be the envy of the world, but our mental health service is not. People are struggling. When they turn for help, it is often not there...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats have a plan to tackle mental health service issues: pledge to ringfence funding for mental health and put extra investment into services. They will also ensure staffing is up to a standard that provides 24 hours a day, seven days a week mental health services. By 2025, 100% of children and young people with diagnosable conditions get NHS treatment.

issues.brexitEurope: A vote for the Liberal Democrats is a vote to Stop Brexit. Stopping Brexit means that we can focus on tackling the big issues facing the UK right now.
issues.economy: Our economy will grow more quickly, providing a Remain Bonus that we will invest in our public services.
issues.health: The NHS may be the envy of the world, but our mental health service is not. People are struggling. When they turn for help, it is often not there...

quotes.text: For many years, mental health has been overlooked by Conservative and Labour governments.
My government will ensure these patients no longer face shamefully long waiting times and are treated with the same care as those with physical illnesses.

images.caption: Liberal Democrats working to stop Brexit and improve mental health services.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Funded by the Remain Bonus, with critical comments on Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Party and Boris Johnson's Conservative Party. Focus is on stopping Brexit and investing the 'Remain Bonus' into public services.
